summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6676 for the improvement of 5th Place S. from S. River St. to S. Michigan St.; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving the same with three inches of asphaltic concrete on the existing street surfaces; under Ordinance No. 105768, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a local improvement fund.
